page.title: 05Bringsty Common(Brockhampton
page.content: Bringsty Common is a large area of common land close to Bromyard.Most of the houses are very old,and they were built between 1500 and the beginning of 1900.Most of the houses are small & they are made of stone but the older ones have timber frames.Some of the houses were so bad dilapideted when people bought then they had to do lots of work to restore them.The A44 main road runs through the middle of Bringsty.Bringsty has a Post Office, a garage and football and cricket piches.Matches are regularly held by Bringsty sports club.People have different areas of garden,some people have only a third of an acre but some have ten acres.Many people commute from Bringsty to nearby towns to find work,some are employed locally.Gardens are cultivated & the area dotted with fruit trees mainly damson.
